==== How to bootstrap the network ====
* Personal approaches works best:
** personal contact
** by phone
** instant messenger
** email
** mailing lists
** newsgroup
** forum
** irc
* personal network of existing volunteers: ask every new volunteer to contact at least two friends personally
* try to aim at least one contact in every major city?
* point people at a volunteer list at computer fairs
* new users that used our services when starting their ubuntu experiment and are still successfully using it after x time
